column4: hi, I have a dual boot between win7 and ubuntu.. is it possible to make my windows home directory and linux home directory the same? i know i can access my windows files my mounting the partition and then navigating to them, but is it possible to make it so when i open "pictures" in ubuntu it will always show the same contents as opening "my pictures" in windows ?
this is not a good idea
It would be very cluttered and having your home partition on an ntfs partition would make at least me nervous
oh right, what's wrong with an ntfs partition?
